text: Like Water for Chocolate () is a 1992 Mexican romantic drama movie directed by Alfonso Arau and was based on the 1989 novel of the same name by Laura Esquivel. It stars Marco Leonardi, Lumi Cavazos, Regina Torné, Mario Iván Martínez, Ada Carrasco, Yareli Arizmendi and was nominated for a Golden Globe Award in 1992. == Other websites == * * Category:1992 romantic drama movies Category:Mexican romance movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Alfonso Arau
title: Like Water for Chocolate (movie)
